info.name: 10fastfingers.com_greenify
info.description:
This is a custom greenify theme for 10fastfingers.com.
This will make your 10fasfingers.com amazing with green color, better alignment, and much more.
Only for personal use, no redistribution allowed.

Author:
----------
Cisco Ramon
Mail: cisco581b@gmail.com
Github: https://github.com/CISSSCO/
info.additionalInfo:
Details:
-----------
-Theme: Dark
-Color: Green
-Release: 28/08/2021
-Version: 1.0.0

Note:
-------
If you want to apply theme on multiplayer section of the page you need to install my other theme for 10ff.net.
-Search for 10ff.net_greenify and install.

Enjoy!!!
